dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare approach the Sentinel Sphere!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace. I mean no harm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? Your kind knows no peace!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek knowledge about this place. Can you help me?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge? Knowledge is power. I will not share it with you!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I understand. I will leave you to your guarding duties.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Leave now, before I decide to obliterate you!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I demand respect, creature!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Respect? You do not demand here! You will either bow or perish!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no business with you. I will be on my way.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A cowardly retreat. Typical of your kind!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am not a coward! I will stand my ground.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Stand your ground then, foolish mortal!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have nothing to prove to you. Farewell.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Farewell? Cowardice wrapped in false bravado!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge you, orb guardian! Let's settle this!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A challenge, how amusing! Prepare for annihilation!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I was mistaken. I apologize for the challenge.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Apologies mean nothing in the face of destruction!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I do not back down from a challenge!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Then face the consequences of your foolishness!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: What do you want from me, Sentinel Sphere?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: I want obedience and fear from intruders like you!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not bow to your threats!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Defiance! How delightful. It will make your defeat even sweeter!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge your authority, orb guardian!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Challenge all you want. It only brings you closer to your end!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see no use in this confrontation. I will leave.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Leaving so soon? How disappointingly predictable.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I acknowledge your power, Sentinel Sphere.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Smart choice. Bowing is the only sensible path for you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not bow, but I will leave in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? Depart then, before my patience runs out.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I submit to your authority. What now?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Submission is wise. You may pass unharmed. For now.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come seeking your guidance, Sentinel Sphere.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Guidance? Mortals always seek what they cannot comprehend.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I believe there is much I can learn from you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Learning requires humility. Show me yours.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I humbly seek your wisdom, orb guardian.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wisdom is not freely given. Prove yourself worthy!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I realize my mistake. I will seek wisdom elsewhere.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise choice. Your departure is welcomed.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I do not seek guidance anymore. Farewell, Sentinel Sphere.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Farewell, ignorant mortal. May your ignorance be your downfall.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not be insulted by you, orb guardian!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Insults? Merely truths you cannot accept!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your words do not affect me. I will leave in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Words can hurt as much as blades. Leave before you feel both!
